ing: 3 tablespoons honey, or more to taste
1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste
des: "Packed with good-for-you ingredients. Refrigerate for up to one week."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix oats, bananas, coconut, dates, walnuts, honey, vanilla extract, nutmeg, and salt together in a bowl by hand; press into a 9-inch square baking dish.
Bake in preheated oven until browned on top, about 30 minutes.
Cool in baking dish on a wire rack until completely cooled before cutting into bars.
